\newcommand{\ottpremise}[1]{ #1 \\}
\newenvironment{ottdefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]}{}
\newenvironment{ottfundefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]\begin{displaymath}\begin{array}{l}}{\end{array}\end{displaymath}}
\newcommand{\ottfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}
\newcommand{\ottnt}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\ottcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\ottcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\ottcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottlongprodline}[2]{& & $#1$ & \multicolumn{4}{l}{$#2$}}
\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottprodnewline}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\ottafterlastrule}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{
 $ \ottmv{i} ,\, \ottmv{j} $ &  \\
 $ \ottmv{nat} ,\, \ottmv{k} $ &  \\
 $ \ottmv{floating\_number} ,\, \ottmv{n} $ &  \\
 $ \ottmv{label} ,\, \alpha $ &  \\
}}

\newcommand{\ottexpression}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{expression}  ,\ \ottnt{e}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{k}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{n}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \phi }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{::}  \ottnt{e'}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{+}  \ottnt{e'}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{reshape} \, \ottnt{e} \, \sigma}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\otttype}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{type}  ,\ \tau}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{tensor} \, \sigma}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{float}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{int}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottdimension}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{dimension}  ,\ \delta}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\alpha}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{k}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottshape}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{shape}  ,\ \sigma}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{.}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\delta  \ottsym{,}  \sigma}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\ottexpression\ottinterrule
\otttype\ottinterrule
\ottdimension\ottinterrule
\ottshape\ottafterlastrule
}}

% defnss
% defns Jop
%% defn sub
\newcommand{\ottdruletXXsubXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{int}  \sqsubseteq  \ottkw{float}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_sub\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXsubXXnum}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{float}  \sqsubseteq  \ottkw{tensor} \, \ottsym{.}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_sub\_num}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXbroadcastOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{tensor} \, \sigma  \sqsubseteq  \ottkw{tensor} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_broadcast1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXbroadcastTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{tensor} \, \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{)}  \sqsubseteq  \ottkw{tensor} \, \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{k}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_broadcast2}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnsub}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\tau  \sqsubseteq  \tau'$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXsubXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXsubXXnum{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXbroadcastOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXbroadcastTwo{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn type
\newcommand{\ottdruletXXnum}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottmv{k}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{int}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_num}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXfloat}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottmv{n}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{float}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_float}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \phi   \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{tensor} \, \ottsym{0}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_empty}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{tensor} \, \sigma}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{tensor} \, \ottsym{(}  \delta  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{::}  \ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{tensor} \, \ottsym{(}  \delta  \ottsym{+}  \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_cons}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXadd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \tau}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{:}  \tau}%
}{
\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{+}  \ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{:}  \tau}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_add}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXreshape}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{tensor} \, \ottcomp{\delta'_{\ottmv{j}}}{\ottmv{j}}}%
\ottpremise{ \prod\limits_ \ottmv{i}   \delta_{\ottmv{i}}   \ottsym{=}   \prod\limits_ \ottmv{j}   \delta'_{\ottmv{j}} }%
}{
\ottkw{reshape} \, \ottnt{e} \, \ottcomp{\delta_{\ottmv{i}}}{\ottmv{i}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{tensor} \, \ottcomp{\delta_{\ottmv{i}}}{\ottmv{i}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_reshape}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXsub}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \tau}%
\ottpremise{\tau  \sqsubseteq  \tau'}%
}{
\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \tau'}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_sub}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntype}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \tau$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXnum{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXfloat{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXempty{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXcons{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXadd{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXreshape{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXsub{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJop}{
\ottdefnsub{}\ottdefntype{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsJop
}

\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
